alert.note: Alert for Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued January 04 at 7:41AM CST until January 04 at 11:00AM CST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 12 REMAINS VALID UNTIL NOON EST TODAY FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN ALABAMA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN SOUTHEAST ALABAMA HOUSTON IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 7 COUNTIES IN BIG BEND FLORIDA GADSDEN LIBERTY IN PANHANDLE FLORIDA BAY CALHOUN GULF JACKSON WASHINGTON IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 13 COUNTIES IN SOUTH CENTRAL GEORGIA TURNER WORTH IN SOUTHWEST GEORGIA BAKER CALHOUN DECATUR DOUGHERTY EARLY GRADY LEE MILLER MITCHELL SEMINOLE TERRELL THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ABE SPRINGS, ALBANY, ALFORDS, ARLINGTON, ASHBURN, AUSMAC, BABCOCK, BAINBRIDGE, BEACHTON, BELLVIEW, BENNETT, BLAKELY, BLOUNTSTOWN, BOYKIN, BRANCHVILLE, BROWNTOWN, CAIRO, CAIRO, CALLAWAY, CAMILLA, CAPEL, CENTERVILLE, CHATTAHOOCHEE, CHIPLEY, CHIPLEY MUNICIPAL AIRPORT, CLARKS MILL, CLARKSVILLE, COLQUITT, COMMISSARY HILL, COOKTOWN, CORDRAYS MILL, COTTON, COTTONWOOD, CRYSTAL LAKE, CUBA, DALKEITH, DAVIS PARK, DAWSON, DAWSON MUNICIPAL A/P, DECATUR CO A/P, DICKEY, DONALDSONVILLE A/P, DONALSONVILLE, DOTHAN, DOUGLASVILLE, DOVEREL, DURHAM, EARLY CO A/P, EAST ALBANY, ECONFINA, EDISON, ELMODEL WMA, ELPINO, ENTERPRISE, FAIRCHILD, FIVE POINTS, FORRESTER, FRINK, GAMMAGE, GORDY, GRACEVILLE, GRADY CO A/P, GRAVES, HANOVER, HARDIN HEIGHTS, HAWKINSTOWN, HEROD, HOBBY, HOGGARD MILL, HONEYVILLE, HOWARD CREEK, ISABELLA, IVEYS MILL, LEESBURG, LITTLE HOPE, LITTMAN, LOCKETT CROSSING, LYNN, LYNN HAVEN, MALONE, MARIANNA, MARYSVILLE, MAYHAW, MILFORD, MITCHELL CO A/P, MONCRIEF, MORGAN, NEWTON, NIXON, OAK GROVE, ODENA, ORANGE HILL, PALMYRA, PANAMA CITY, PELHAM, PINE PARK, POPLAR HEAD, PORT ST. JOE, PRETORIA, QUINCY, QUINCY AIRPORT, RED ROCK, RED STORE CROSSROADS, RICHTER CROSSROADS, RIVERTURN, SANTA CLARA, SCOTTS FERRY, SEMINOLE STATE PARK, SIMSVILLE, SMITHVILLE, SNEADS, SOUTHWEST GA REGIONAL A/P, STEINHAM STORE, SWEETWATER, SYLVESTER, SYLVESTER AIRPORT, TURNER CITY, WALKER, WEST BAINBRIDGE, WETUMPKA, WEWAHITCHKA, WHITE CITY, WILLIAMSBURG, WORTH, AND YEOMANS.
